scripts.build:ui: rm -rf build && cd ../../fullstack-open/part2/phonebook && npm run build --prod && cp -r build ../../../fullstack-open-backend-servers/phonebook-backend
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && git push && npm run deploy
scripts.heroku-postbuild: cd client/ && npm install && npm run build
